references.paper_title: Mobile-agent-v2: Mobile device operation assistant with effective navigation via multi-agent collaboration
references.reason: This paper is a direct predecessor to the current work, and its multi-agent framework is heavily modified and improved upon in the present study.

references.paper_title: Appagent: Multimodal agents as smartphone users
references.reason: This paper is another major point of comparison for the current work, serving as a baseline for evaluating the performance improvements achieved.

references.paper_title: Episodic memory: From mind to brain
references.reason: This paper is cited for its relevant theoretical framework on memory and knowledge, used to support the design and justification of the self-evolution module.

references.paper_title: Structure and function of declarative and nondeclarative memory systems
references.reason: This paper is a key theoretical foundation for understanding the types of knowledge (procedural vs. declarative) that the model is designed to learn and utilize.

This foundational paper is cited for its theoretical background on cognitive skill acquisition and the role of practice and experience, which are incorporated into the design of the self-evolution module.
